Script.name: RescueScript
EnemyScripts
Script.script:
------------------------------------------------- -- Put your Lua functions here. -- -- -- -- Note that you can also use external Scripts -- -------------------------------------------------
-- The ghoul of an opulent merchant
function idMob(xname) local mobnames= { "zombie", "ghoul", "skeleton", "wight", "spectre", "ghast", "ghost"}
local enemytable = string.split(xname, " ")
if string.find(xname, "doppelganger") then return("doppelganger") end
-- check for containing a matching name for nx=1, #mobnames, 1 do
--if string.find("hell hound", mobnames[nx]) then -- return("wolf") --end
if string.find(xname, mobnames[nx]) then return(mobnames[nx]) end end
-- return the final word in the string return( enemytable[#enemytable] ) end
function getEnemy() enemy = enemy or ""
return(enemy) end
function setEnemy(xval) if getEnemy() ~= xval then echoDebug("<red>\n[Setting enemy to: <blue>" .. xval .. "<red>]\n") end
enemy = xval end
function sendCon(xname) if conSent == nil then conSent=true
mud:send("con " .. xname ) end end

Script.name: SpellAlerts
Script.script:
------------------------------------------------- -- Put your Lua functions here. -- -- -- -- Note that you can also use external Scripts -- ------------------------------------------------- function getQuake() bcastQuake = bcastQuake or false
return(bcastQuake) end
function setQuake(xval) bcastQuake = xval end
function castQuake() if getQuake() then if getSpellCount("earthquake") > 0 then spell:setNext("c 'earthquake'") --spell:setNext("eaq human") setQuake(false) return(true) end end
return(false) end

Script.name: MountScripts
Script.script:
------------------------------------------------- -- Put your Lua functions here. -- -- -- -- Note that you can also use external Scripts -- -------------------------------------------------
mount = mount or {}
-- addbutton("SummonMount", 10, 15)
function mount:set(xname) self.mountname = xname
if xname ~= nil and NyyLIB.initgui then addbutton("MountDismount", 10, 15) else if checkMask("summonmount") then addbutton("SummonMount", 10, 15) end end end
function mount:get() return( self.mountname ) end
function mount:setMounted(xval) self.mounted=xval
dismounted=false
if xval then addbutton("mounted_charge", 3, 1) else addbutton("bashing", 3, 1) end end
function mount:getMounted() if self.mounted == nil then self.mounted=false end
return(self.mounted) end
function mount:charge(xtarget) if not timer:get("mountedcharge") then if xtarget ~= nil then if checkMask("dire") then mud:send("mc " .. xtarget) else mud:send("charge " .. xtarget) end else if checkMask("dire") then mud:send("mc") else mud:send("charge") end end
timer:set("mountedcharge", 8)
return(true) end
return(false) end

Script.name: TrainScript
Script.script:
------------------------------------------------- -- Put your Lua functions here. -- -- -- -- Note that you can also use external Scripts -- -------------------------------------------------
-- fightreturn false: send flee -- fightreturn true: send assist
function fleeMem() -- ignore trigger if in fugue if map:getRoom() == 93848 then return end
if charData:get("memcount") == nil or charData:get("memcount") == 0 and not checkMask("psi") then fightreturn=true return end
if not NyyLIB.castertrain then -- mud:send("status " .. matches[2]) mud:send("flee") end
fightreturn=true NyyLIB.castertrain=true end

Script.name: promptEvent
Script.script:
------------------------------------------------- -- Put your Lua functions here. -- -- -- -- Note that you can also use external Scripts -- -------------------------------------------------
-- This event will be called whenever the mud prompt has been received
mobs = mobs or {}
function promptEvent(event) local current=spell:getCurrent() or "nil" local memcount= charData:get("memcount") or 0
if prompt:get("enemy") ~= "" then assistSent = nil
-- send con to update database if needed
local roomid = map:getRoom()
if roomid ~= nil then if mobs[roomid] == nil then sendCon(prompt:get("enemy")) end end end
-- If engaged in combat AND a look command was not sent/unreceived, set not moving if prompt:get("enemy") ~= "" or type(groupList:whoTanking()) == "table" and NyyLIB.tolook == 0 then automem=0
if spell:getMoving() then echoDebug("<red>[Currently in combat]\n") end
spell:setMem(false) spell:setMoving(false) end
-- send furious assault if whorace( whoami() ) == "Half-Orc" then if prompt:get("enemy") ~= "" then if timer:get("furiousassult") == nil then timer:set("furiousassult", 90) mud:send("fa") end end end
if prompt:get("enemy") == "nightmare" then if getZone() ~= "Ashstone" then mud:send("disengage") return end end
-- send all queued commands if not casting or in fugue
if spell:getCurrent() == nil or map:getRoom() == 93848 then -- send queue contents mud:sendCommands() end
-- if moving don't cast if spell:getMoving() then return end
-- proc equipment if needed and not currently in fugue
if map:getRoom() ~= 93848 then procEquipment() end
-- Process cast/send queue
--if checkMask("caster") then spell:cast() --end
-- if inside fugue return if map:getRoom() == 93848 then return end
-- don't cast if trying to mem or look sent/not received or nomagic is set if spell:getMem() or memsent or NyyLIB.tolook ~= 0 or nomagic then return end
-- call class specific spell script if autocast enabled if charData:get("autocast") then local cname="Spells" .. string.gsub(whoclass(), "-", "_") -- local cname="Spells" .. whoclass()
if _G[cname] ~= nil then _G[cname]() end end
-- automem segment
memsent = memsent or false
if (automem ~= 0 and automem ~= 1) or groupList:size() == 1 then if spell:count() ~= 0 or spell:getCurrent() ~= nil then return end if checkMask("casterPsi") or checkMask("nonPriestCaster") then if charData:get("autocast") then if charData:get("memcount") ~= 0 and not spell:getMem() and spell:getCurrent() == nil and not memsent then echoDebug("<red>[initiating automem]\n") mud:send("mem") memsent = true --automem = 0 end end end end end
function procEquipment() local hp=prompt:get("hp") local maxhp=prompt:get("maxhp") local percent=hp/maxhp
-- exit if not in combat (no tank in prompt) -- this should prevent (some) proc commands from being issued in fugue
if prompt:get("tank") == "" then return end
-- proc manacle on < 70% hp if not already blurred
if not buff:get("blur") then if percent < .70 then if isIconActive("TiaManacle") and timer:get("TiaManacle") == nil then TiaManacle() end end end
-- proc volance on < 60% hp
if percent < .60 then if isIconActive("TiaVolance") and timer:get("TiaVolance") == nil then TiaVolance() end end
-- proc warder on < 30% hp
if percent < .30 then if isIconActive("TiaWarder") and timer:get("TiaWarder") == nil then TiaWarder() end end
-- proc items on < 25% hp
if percent < .25 then -- proc supple girdle if isIconActive("SuppleGirdle") and not mount:getMounted() and timer:get("SuppleGirdle") == nil then SuppleGirdle() return end
-- proc skill: layhands if paladin
if checkMask("pal") then if not timer:get("layhand") then mud:send("layhand me") timer:set("layhand", 24*60) end end
if checkMask("anti") then if not timer:get("lifetap") then mud:send("lifetap") timer:set("lifetap", 24*60) end end
-- proc tiamat sleeves if isIconActive("TiaSleeves") and timer:get("TiaSleeves") == nil then TiaSleeves() end end end

Script.name: statusEvent
sysManualLocationSetEvent
Script.script: ------------------------------------------------- -- Put your Lua functions here. -- -- -- -- Note that you can also use external Scripts -- ------------------------------------------------- function sysManualLocationSetEvent(xtmp) --display("X") end

Script.name: sampleTimer
Script.script:
------------------------------------------------- -- Put your Lua functions here. -- -- -- -- Note that you can also use external Scripts -- -------------------------------------------------
-- This function when used in a timer will display the countdown on screen -- and then print an expired message
function sampleTimer(event) local current=timer:get("sampleTimer")
if event == "timer" then cecho("<green>[Timer: " .. current .. "]\n") end
if event == "expire" then cecho("<red>[Timer has expired]\n") end end

Script.name: installEvent
Script.script:
------------------------------------------------- -- Put your Lua functions here. -- -- -- -- Note that you can also use external Scripts -- ------------------------------------------------- -- sysInstallPackage
-- this function will be called with mudlet 3.1+ on package installation
function installEvent() cecho("<red>[\n[New package install event called]\n")
-- mudlet 3.1+ in use, restart not required disableAlias("restart")
initNyyLIB() end
